text: Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 65. Should any bhikkhunī sponsor (the Acceptance of) a married woman who (has been married) less than twelve years, it is to be confessed. [See Bhikkhus' Pācittiya 65]
